sub_title: Quant Model Developer | Risk and Analytics | Data Science
summary:
I consider myself a team player, while my PhD taught me to work independently and be a self-taught learner. I am curious and genuinely interested in understanding diverse problems and using my strong mathematical skills and analytical background to provide powerful insights to solve them. I have proven experience in building complex models in different programming languages, automating analysis to improve efficiency and reduce errors, and also multitasking without forgetting to prioritize when necessary. I am not afraid to ask questions or find out the why of things. I have excellent written and verbal communication skills, which help me transfer knowledge and manage cross-functional projects with horizontal and vertical communication. I also have experience in industry and research, having been involved with top-tier banks, government organizations, and big four companies.

In a nutshell, I am an enthusiastic, ambitious and hard-working person, with a knack for distilling complex methodologies into human words for senior management, capable to present results to diverse crowds and stakeholders.

For more information, please visit my personal webpage: garcia-alvarado.org
